languages.text: {n}Из-под маски Назракея слышится приглушенный смешок.{/n} "Комморра принимает твой дар, Иремерисс. Но как же мне быть, ведь Маражай — твой первый клинок. Вышвырнуть его из дворца и обречь на позор? Или проявить милость и позволить покинуть палаты самостоятельно?" {n}Холодный взгляд архонта падает на вас.{/n} "Кажется, я знаю, кто примет это непростое решение. Существо, к речам которого совет архонтов должен был прислушаться. Верно, Маражай? Ты получишь то, о чем так страстно желал — мон-кай решит сегодня твою судьбу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из-под маски Назракея слышится приглушенный смешок.{/n} "Комморра принимает твой дар, Иремерисс. Но как же мне быть, ведь Маражай — твой первый клинок. Вышвырнуть его из дворца и обречь на позор? Или проявить милость и позволить покинуть палаты самостоятельно?" {n}Холодный взгляд архонта падает на вас.{/n} "Кажется, я знаю, кто примет это непростое решение. Существо, к речам которого совет архонтов должен был прислушаться. Верно, Маражай? Ты получишь то, о чем так страстно желал — мон-кай решит сегодня твою судьбу".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

Вышвырнуть его из дворца и обречь на позор? Или проявить милость и позволить покинуть палаты самостоятельно?" {n}Холодный взгляд архонта падает на вас.{/n} "Кажется, я знаю, кто примет это непростое решение. languages.text: {n}纳札骸的面具之下传来了低沉的笑声。{/n}“科摩罗接受你的礼物，伊芮梅莉斯。不过，玛拉斋是你的首席利刃，我该怎么做呢？我应该把他赶出宫殿，要他蒙受耻辱吗？还是说，我应该手下留情，让他自行离开这个房间？”{n}执政官冰冷的目光落在了你的身上。{/n}“这个艰难的决定应当由谁来做，我想，我已经找到答案了。就让这只本该在执政官议会中哀嚎的生物来做吧。这很合理吧，玛拉斋？你得到了你一直渴求的结果——你的命运将由这只猴子来决定。”
languages.original_text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}纳札骸的面具之下传来了低沉的笑声。{/n}“科摩罗接受你的礼物，伊芮梅莉斯。不过，玛拉斋是你的首席利刃，我该怎么做呢？我应该把他赶出宫殿，要他蒙受耻辱吗？还是说，我应该手下留情，让他自行离开这个房间？”{n}执政官冰冷的目光落在了你的身上。{/n}“这个艰难的决定应当由谁来做，我想，我已经找到答案了。就让这只本该在执政官议会中哀嚎的生物来做吧。这很合理吧，玛拉斋？你得到了你一直渴求的结果——你的命运将由这只猴子来决定。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイの仮面の下からくぐもった笑い声が響いた。{/n}「コモラフはお前の賜物を受け取った、イレメリス。しかし、マラズハイはお前の忠実な剣…奴の処遇はどうする？宮殿から追い出し、不名誉な刑に処すべきか？それとも慈悲をもって、奴が自力でこの部屋を出るのを許すべきか？」{n}アーコンの冷たい視線がこちらに向けられる。{/n}「この難しい決断は別の者に下してもらおう。アーコン評議会が鳴き声に注意を払うべきだった、とある生物に委ねようではないか。そうだろう、マラズハイ？お前も待ち望んでいたのだろう…お前の運命はモン＝ケイに決めてもらおうではないか」
languages.original_text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}ナズラクヘイの仮面の下からくぐもった笑い声が響いた。{/n}「コモラフはお前の賜物を受け取った、イレメリス。しかし、マラズハイはお前の忠実な剣…奴の処遇はどうする？宮殿から追い出し、不名誉な刑に処すべきか？それとも慈悲をもって、奴が自力でこの部屋を出るのを許すべきか？」{n}アーコンの冷たい視線がこちらに向けられる。{/n}「この難しい決断は別の者に下してもらおう。アーコン評議会が鳴き声に注意を払うべきだった、とある生物に委ねようではないか。そうだろう、マラズハイ？お前も待ち望んでいたのだろう…お前の運命はモン＝ケイに決めてもらおうではないか」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Puedes oír una risa amortiguada bajo la máscara de Nazrakhei.{/n} «Commorragh acepta tu regalo, Yremeryss. Pero ¿qué debería hacer, cuando Marazhai es el primero de tus espadas? ¿Expulsarlo del palacio y condenarlo a la desgracia? ¿O mostrar piedad y permitirle abandonar la cámara por su propio pie?». {n}La mirada helada del Arconte se detiene sobre ti.{/n} «Creo que sé quién puede tomar esta difícil decisión: la criatura cuyos gimoteos el Consejo de Arcontes debía escuchar. ¿No es así, Marazhai? Recibirás lo que estabas buscando: {mf|el|la} mon-keigh decidirá tu futuro».
languages.original_text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes oír una risa amortiguada bajo la máscara de Nazrakhei.{/n} «Commorragh acepta tu regalo, Yremeryss. Pero ¿qué debería hacer, cuando Marazhai es el primero de tus espadas? ¿Expulsarlo del palacio y condenarlo a la desgracia? ¿O mostrar piedad y permitirle abandonar la cámara por su propio pie?». {n}La mirada helada del Arconte se detiene sobre ti.{/n} «Creo que sé quién puede tomar esta difícil decisión: la criatura cuyos gimoteos el Consejo de Arcontes debía escuchar. ¿No es así, Marazhai? Recibirás lo que estabas buscando: {mf|el|la} mon-keigh decidirá tu futuro».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un petit rire étouffé provenir de sous le masque de Nazrakhei.{/n} « Commorragh accepte votre présent, Yremeryss. Mais que dois-je faire ? Marazhai est, après tout, votre première lame. Dois-je le renvoyer du palais et le condamner à la disgrâce ? Ou faire preuve de miséricorde et lui permettre de quitter cet endroit de sa propre volonté ? » {n}Le regard glacial de l'Archonte se pose sur vous.{/n} « Je sais qui va prendre cette décision : une créature dont le Conseil des archontes devait de toute manière entendre les pleurnicheries. J'imagine que vous approuvez, Marazhai. N'était-ce pas là ce que vous espériez ? Que {mf|le|la} mon-keigh décide de votre destin ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez un petit rire étouffé provenir de sous le masque de Nazrakhei.{/n} « Commorragh accepte votre présent, Yremeryss. Mais que dois-je faire ? Marazhai est, après tout, votre première lame. Dois-je le renvoyer du palais et le condamner à la disgrâce ? Ou faire preuve de miséricorde et lui permettre de quitter cet endroit de sa propre volonté ? » {n}Le regard glacial de l'Archonte se pose sur vous.{/n} « Je sais qui va prendre cette décision : une créature dont le Conseil des archontes devait de toute manière entendre les pleurnicheries. J'imagine que vous approuvez, Marazhai. N'était-ce pas là ce que vous espériez ? Que {mf|le|la} mon-keigh décide de votre destin ? »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Unter Nazrakheis Maske ist ein unterdrücktes Kichern zu hören.{/n} "Commorragh akzeptiert Euer Geschenk, Yremeryss. Aber was soll ich tun, ist Marazhai doch Eure erste Klinge? Soll ich ihn aus dem Palast jagen und zur Schande verurteilen? Oder soll ich Gnade zeigen und ihm gestatten, die Kammer alleine zu verlassen?" {n}Der frostige Blick des Archons fällt auf dich.{/n} "Ich denke, ich weiß, wer diese schwierige Entscheidung treffen wird. Eine Kreatur, auf deren Gequake der Rat der Archonten hören sollte. Das ist doch richtig, oder, Marazhai? Ihr erhaltet, was Ihr ersehnt habt – {mf|der|die} Chem-Pan-Sey entscheidet über Euer Schicksal."
languages.original_text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Unter Nazrakheis Maske ist ein unterdrücktes Kichern zu hören.{/n} "Commorragh akzeptiert Euer Geschenk, Yremeryss. Aber was soll ich tun, ist Marazhai doch Eure erste Klinge? Soll ich ihn aus dem Palast jagen und zur Schande verurteilen? Oder soll ich Gnade zeigen und ihm gestatten, die Kammer alleine zu verlassen?" {n}Der frostige Blick des Archons fällt auf dich.{/n} "Ich denke, ich weiß, wer diese schwierige Entscheidung treffen wird. Eine Kreatur, auf deren Gequake der Rat der Archonten hören sollte. Das ist doch richtig, oder, Marazhai? Ihr erhaltet, was Ihr ersehnt habt – {mf|der|die} Chem-Pan-Sey entscheidet über Euer Schicksal."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei'in maskesinin altından boğuk bir kıkırdama duyulabiliyor.{/n} "Commorragh, hediyeni kabul ediyor Yremeryss. Peki sence ben ne yapmalıyım? Sonuçta Marazhai, kılıçlarının ilki? Onu saraydan sürüp onurunu tamamen bertaraf etmeli miyim? Yoksa merhametli davranıp bu odadan kendisinin ayrılmasına izin mi vermeliyim?" {n}Arkon'un tüyler ürperten bakışı sana kilitleniyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum bu zor kararı kimin vereceğini biliyorum: Arkonlar Konseyi'nin sesini duyması gereken yaratık... Öyle değil mi Marazhai? Özlem duyduğun şeyi nihayet elde edeceksin. Kaderine mon-keigh karar verecek."
languages.original_text: {n}A muffled chuckle can be heard from under Nazrakhei's mask.{/n} "Commorragh accepts your gift, Yremeryss. But what should I do, for Marazhai is the first among your blades? Should I cast him out of the palace and condemn to disgrace? Or should I be merciful and allow him to leave the chamber on his own?" {n}The Archon's chilling gaze falls upon you.{/n} "I think I know who will make this difficult decision. A creature whose mewling the Council of Archons was meant to heed. Is this not right, Marazhai? You will receive what you have been longing for — it will be the mon-keigh who decides your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei'in maskesinin altından boğuk bir kıkırdama duyulabiliyor.{/n} "Commorragh hediyeni kabul ediyor Yremeryss ancak ben ne yapmalıyım sence? Marazhai kılıçlarının ilki sonuçta? Onu saraydan sürüp onurunu tamamen bertaraf edeyim mi? Yoksa merhametli davranıp bu odadan kendisinin ayrılmasına izin mi vermeliyim?" {n}Arkon'un tüyler ürperten bakışı sana kilitleniyor.{/n} "Bu zor kararı kimin vereceğini sanıyorum biliyorum. Arkonlar Konseyi'nin dikkat kesilmesi gereken bir miyavlamaya sahip bir yaratık. Öyle değil mi Marazhai? Özlem duyduğun şeyi nihayet elde edeceksin. Kaderine mon-keigh karar verecek."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
